SEARCH
Package com.olxapplication.controller

Class AnnouncementController

java.lang.Object
com.olxapplication.controller.AnnouncementController
@Controller @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/announcement") @Validated public class AnnouncementController extends Object
This controller class provides API endpoints for managing announcements within the application.

  • Method Details

    • getAnnounces

      @GetMapping("/get") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getAnnounces()
      Retrieves all announcements.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView containing all announcements.

    • insertAnnouncement

      @PostMapping("/insert") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView insertAnnouncement(@ModelAttribute("announcement") AnnouncementWebDTO announcementDTO, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Inserts a new announcement.
      Parameters:
      announcementDTO - The announcement to be inserted.
      redirectAttributes - Redirect attributes( the response message to be displayed ).
      Returns:
      ModelAndView redirecting to "/announcement/get".

    • insertMyAnnouncement

      @PostMapping("/insertMine/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView insertMyAnnouncement(@PathVariable("id") String id, @ModelAttribute("announcement") AnnouncementWebDTO announcementDTO, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Inserts a new announcement by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user.
      announcementDTO - The announcement to be inserted.
      redirectAttributes - Redirect attributes( the response message to be displayed ).
      Returns:
      ModelAndView redirecting to "/announcement/getMine/{id}".

    • getMyAnnouncements

      @GetMapping("/getMine/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getMyAnnouncements(@PathVariable("id") String userId)
      Retrieves all announcements by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView containing the user's announcements.

    • getOtherAnnouncements

      @GetMapping("/getOthers/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getOtherAnnouncements(@PathVariable("id") String userId, @ModelAttribute("categoryName") String categoryName)
      Retrieves all announcements except those by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      categoryName - The string that match category names to filter the announcements by their category .
      Returns:
      ModelAndView containing the other users' announcements.

    • getOtherAnnouncementsAsc

      @GetMapping("/getOthers/0/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getOtherAnnouncementsAsc(@PathVariable("id") String userId, @ModelAttribute("categoryName") String categoryName)
      Displays the announcements that are not posted by the user with the specified ID, ordered descending by their newPrice.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      categoryName - The string that match category names to filter the announcements by their category .
      Returns:
      ModelAndView "UserGetOtherAnnounces".

    • getOtherAnnouncementsDesc

      @GetMapping("/getOthers/1/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getOtherAnnouncementsDesc(@PathVariable("id") String userId, @ModelAttribute("categoryName") String categoryName)
      Displays the announcements that are not posted by the user with the specified ID, ordered ascending by their newPrice.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      categoryName - The string that match category names to filter the announcements by their category .
      Returns:
      ModelAndView "UserGetOtherAnnounces".

    • deleteAnnouncement

      @PostMapping("/delete/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView deleteAnnouncement(@PathVariable("id") String announcementId, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Deletes a specific announcement by ID.
      Parameters:
      announcementId - The ID of the announcement.
      redirectAttributes - Redirect attributes( the response message to be displayed ).
      Returns:
      ModelAndView redirecting to "/announcement/get".

    • deleteMyAnnouncement

      @PostMapping("/deleteMine/{idUser}/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView deleteMyAnnouncement(@PathVariable("id") String announcementId, @PathVariable("idUser") String userId, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Deletes a specific announcement by ID for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      announcementId - The ID of the announcement.
      userId - The ID of the user.
      redirectAttributes - Redirect attributes( the response message to be displayed ).
      Returns:
      ModelAndView redirecting to "/announcement/getMine/{userId}".

    • updateAnnouncement

      @PostMapping("/update/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView updateAnnouncement(@PathVariable("id") String announcementId, @ModelAttribute("announcement") AnnouncementWebDTO announcementDTO, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Updates a specific announcement by ID.
      Parameters:
      announcementId - The ID of the announcement.
      announcementDTO - The updated announcement details.
      redirectAttributes - Redirect attributes( the response message to be displayed ).
      Returns:
      ModelAndView redirecting to "/announcement/get".

    • updateMyAnnouncement

      @PostMapping("/updateMine/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView updateMyAnnouncement(@PathVariable("id") String announcementId, @ModelAttribute("announcement") AnnouncementWebDTO announcementDTO, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Updates a specific announcement by ID for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      announcementId - The ID of the announcement.
      announcementDTO - The updated announcement details.
      redirectAttributes - Redirect attributes( the response message to be displayed ).
      Returns:
      ModelAndView redirecting to "/announcement/getMine/{announcementDTO.getUser()}".
